channel.title: We need a click section :P
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "We need a click section :P"

item.title: Re: We need a click section :P
item.content:encoded: That's probably more work than it's worth.

item.title: Re: We need a click section :P
item.content:encoded: If clicking on multiple players gives them stamina, then you should click on all players each time your IP changes (such as when you use a different PC connected to an Internet connection you haven't used before).

item.title: Re: We need a click section :P
item.content:encoded:
To be honest, I don't think that just clicking people's links does anything. I think only the first link you click on for the day gets credit. Though, I could be wrong, I only play Uzuki and I can't really keep track of who's clicked what where and when!

But, I do think the character introduction thread, where everyone's signature is, is the place to go to click on people's names to get them stamina.

item.title: We need a click section :P
item.content:encoded:
Just a thread somewhere dedicated to getting people clicks for bonus stamina. I know there is a post somewhere asking who your character is but I don't think most people are going to realize it would be nice to just go down and click each persons name. I didn't at first :P

Should just be one long thread somewhere for it o.o; unless we should just try to attract attention to that one thread?
